title: Gilded Cage
description: Warning: This story contains explicit sex and severe BDSM elements, including non-consensual BDSM activities with an initially unwilling kidnap victim. If fantasy material of this nature is disturbing to you, do not purchase this book.Could an average woman survive being kidnapped and sexually tortured and teased? A case of mistaken identity caused Faith Whittaker to become such a woman, captured and held by powerful drug lord Cordero "El Diablo" De La Fuenta, subject to the painful whims of his twisted pleasures. What would happen to her when he found out she wasn't who he thought she was?Follow Faith's dangerous journey of agony and ecstasy, and the awakening of her darker desires at the hands of a complete stranger, trapped in her gilded cage.
author: Carolyn Faulkner
